name: WORLD'S END
description:
In a world full of life, yet emanating despair, you drift through the darkness to learn what happened to this place in which you reside...

You play as an entity of light adrift in a world natural destruction, collecting clues to the past, present, and the future...

This game is still massively a WIP, however we plan to work on it until completion, with no final release date as of yet.

Programming and Assembly by Sir Felois

Art and Writing by Fedorpig
